cooks.name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
cooks.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.
cooks.ingredients: Spaghetti, minced beef, tomato sauce, garlic, onion, olive oil
cooks.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Prepare sauce by saut√©ing garlic and onion, adding beef, and mixing with tomato sauce.

cooks.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
cooks.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with grilled chicken and Caesar dressing.
cooks.ingredients: Romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, Caesar dressing, croutons, Parmesan cheese
cooks.instructions: Grill chicken, chop lettuce, mix all ingredients, and drizzle Caesar dressing.

cooks.name: Beef Tacos
cooks.description: Crispy tacos filled with seasoned beef and toppings.
cooks.ingredients: Ground beef, taco shells, lettuce, cheese, salsa, sour cream
cooks.instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

cooks.name: Margherita Pizza
cooks.description: A classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and fresh basil.
cooks.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, fresh basil, olive oil
cooks.instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough, top with mozzarella and basil, bake until golden.

cooks.name: Butter Chicken
cooks.description: Rich and creamy Indian butter chicken curry.
cooks.ingredients: Chicken, butter, cream, tomato puree, spices, garlic, ginger
cooks.instructions: Cook chicken with spices. Prepare creamy tomato sauce and mix with chicken.

cooks.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
cooks.description: A quick and healthy stir-fried vegetable medley.
cooks.ingredients: Broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, soy sauce, garlic, ginger
cooks.instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce for flavor.

cooks.name: BBQ Ribs
cooks.description: Tender pork ribs slathered in smoky BBQ sauce.
cooks.ingredients: Pork ribs, BBQ sauce, salt, pepper, garlic powder
cooks.instructions: Season ribs, bake until tender, and coat with BBQ sauce.

cooks.name: Sushi Rolls
cooks.description: Delicate sushi rolls filled with fresh ingredients.
cooks.ingredients: Sushi rice, nori, salmon, cucumber, avocado, soy sauce
cooks.instructions: Roll sushi with rice, nori, and fillings. Slice and serve with soy sauce.

cooks.name: Pancakes
cooks.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup.
cooks.ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk, sugar, baking powder, butter
cooks.instructions: Mix batter, cook on griddle until golden, serve with syrup.

cooks.name: Chocolate Brownies
cooks.ingredients: Butter, sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, flour, chocolate chips
cooks.instructions: Mix ingredients, pour into pan, bake until set.
